actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the United States to hold in trust for the Assiniboine and Sioux Tribes of the Fort Peck Indian Reservation in Montana approximately 1.8 acres of land.

summary.text: Requires approximately 1.8 acres of land situated within the Fort Peck Indian Reservation, Montana, to be held in trust by the United States for the Assiniboine and Sioux Tribes.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the United States to hold in trust for the Assiniboine and Sioux Tribes of the Fort Peck Indian Reservation in Montana approximately 1.8 acres of land.
